title: Microsoft.Extensions Libraries
description: Common application building blocks from the `Microsoft.Extensions.*` libraries including dependency injection, configuration, logging, caching, and HTTP clients. Key types include `IServiceCollection`, `IConfiguration`, `ILogger`, `IMemoryCache`, and `IHttpClientFactory`. Also covers globalization, channels, and compliance features like data redaction.
shortDescription: DI, configuration, logging, caching, and HTTP clients.
